Copy

public static void Copy( float[] dst, int p0, PFloat src, int p1, int len );
Copies a PFloat into a C# array.
Parameters:
dst - The destination C# array.
p0 - The index to start copying to.
src - The allocated memory array to copy from.
p1 - The index to start copying from.
len - The number of atomic (float) elements to copy.

Copy

public static void Copy( PFloat dst, int p0, float[] src, int p1, int len );
Copies a C# float array into a PFloat class.
Parameters:
dst - The destination allocated memory.
p0 - The index to start copying to.
src - The source float array.
p1 - The index to start copying from.
len - The number of atomic (float) elements to copy.

SizeOfType

public override int SizeOfType();
Returns sizeof(float), 4 bytes as per MS specification, this is the 'atomic' element size.
